english.segment1: All I have is Yours to own. All I am belongs to You alone. So let my life be an offering to You my Lord and King
english.segment2: Who am I to know Your name Oh Lord?. I was nothing until You came. So let my life be an offering to you my Lord and King. Oh to You this song I sing
english.segment3: CHORUS. Lord, this is my only true obsession. To let myself be in Your possession. Refine me until You find me pleasing. Lord unto You this song I sing
english.segment4: All I am is Yours to own. All I am belongs to You alone. So let my life be an offering to You my Lord and King. Unto You this song I sing
